forecast.day_comments: A chance of snow showers, mainly before 3am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 15. Northwest wind 6 to 8 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 30%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: Partly sunny, with a high near 24. Northwest wind around 7 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.
